CONCATENATE wd_this->export_file_name lc_exten INTO l_file_name SEPARATED BY lc_dot .

DATA lo_window TYPE REF TO if_wd_window.

SORT lt_config_var DESCENDING BY browser_height browser_width.
IF l_unfit IS INITIAL and r_config_match is initial.
* if no size maintained in the variants - or no match found by size of the client
READ TABLE lt_config_var INTO r_config_match WITH KEY config_source = '02'.
READ TABLE lt_config_var INTO r_config_match INDEX 1.
* check if records count is to be show
*-- check if filter button is selected by user
IF r_param->id = lc_swfd OR " Filter define
r_param->id = lc_swvl. " Change view with fiter defined
* DATA: lo_r_param TYPE REF TO if_salv_wd_table_std_function,
* DATA lo_nd_data TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
* DATA lr_table TYPE REF TO data.

* DATA lo_config TYPE REF TO cl_salv_wd_config_table.
**-- check if filter button is selected by user
* IF l_value = lc_swfd OR " Filter define
* l_value = lc_swvl. " Change view with fiter defined
* CREATE DATA lr_table TYPE HANDLE nd_tbl_descr.
* DATA lo_nd_function_elements TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
* DATA lo_el_function_elements TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
* get ALV config from referenced ALV usage
DATA lo_cmp_usage TYPE REF TO if_wd_component_usage.
DATA lo_interfacecontroller TYPE REF TO iwci_salv_wd_table .
DATA from TYPE REF TO cl_salv_wd_config_table.
data: lo_from_table_settings type ref to IF_SALV_WD_TABLE_SETTINGS.
data: lo_from_column_settings type ref to IF_SALV_WD_COLUMN_SETTINGS,
data: lo_from_export_settings type ref to IF_SALV_WD_EXPORT_SETTINGS.
data: lo_from_field_settings type ref to IF_SALV_WD_FIELD_SETTINGS.
data: lo_from_std_func type ref to IF_SALV_WD_STD_FUNCTIONS.
* update original config to ZALV_CONFIG and ZALV_COLUMNS
* get wrapper config from ZALV_CONFIG and ZALV_COLUMNS
* DATA: lo_ref_ic TYPE REF TO iwci_salv_wd_table,
** get the path of mapped context node (one that's mapped with data node of ALV)
** get the node name from the path
* SPLIT lwa_external_mapping-path AT '.' INTO TABLE lt_path.
* READ TABLE lt_path INDEX l_count INTO l_node.
* Create data handler instance and register data change event
* this is required for updating the count
DATA: lo_usage TYPE REF TO cl_wdr_component_usage,
* check if ztalv_config_var has a config variant
SELECT * FROM ztalv_config_var INTO TABLE lt_config_var
* no config found - hence current config will be used as-is
* get the client screen size for finding correct variants
* now match the qualifiers and resolution
** match the qualifiers to pick right variant
* SORT table lt_config_var BY qualifier1 qualifier2 qualifier3.
* WITH KEY qualifier1 = qualifier1 BINARY SEARCH.
** no config found - hence current config will be used as-is
SELECT SINGLE * FROM ztalv_config INTO lwa_config
* no config found - hence current config will be used as-is
SELECT * FROM ztalv_columns INTO TABLE lt_columns
* Also get the X values for not overriding specific alv property
SELECT SINGLE * FROM ztalv_config_x INTO lwa_config_x
SELECT * FROM ztalv_columns_x INTO TABLE lt_columns_x
DATA: lo_usage TYPE REF TO cl_wdr_component_usage,
* Upadte DB table ZALV_CONFIG an ZALV_COLUMNS ONLY IN DEV SYSTEM
* Check if this system is DEV system for projects. We don't want run
SELECT SINGLE * FROM ztalv_config INTO lwa_config
AND config_source = '01'. " 01 is for original config / 02 is for wrapper config
* get ALV config from referenced ALV usage
DATA lo_cmp_usage TYPE REF TO if_wd_component_usage.
DATA lo_interfacecontroller TYPE REF TO iwci_salv_wd_table .
DATA to TYPE REF TO cl_salv_wd_config_table.
DATA: lo_to_table_settings TYPE REF TO if_salv_wd_table_settings.
DATA: lo_to_column_settings TYPE REF TO if_salv_wd_column_settings,
READ TABLE lt_columns INTO lwa_column WITH KEY alv_column = lwa_to_columns-id BINARY SEARCH.
READ TABLE lt_columns_x INTO lwa_columns_x WITH KEY alv_column = lwa_to_columns-id BINARY SEARCH.
DATA: lo_to_export_settings TYPE REF TO if_salv_wd_export_settings.
DATA: lo_to_field_settings TYPE REF TO if_salv_wd_field_settings.
DATA: lo_to_std_func TYPE REF TO if_salv_wd_std_functions.
